column2: an A.M. Eatery////Best Cinnamon Toast Pancakes ever and not one establishment can duplicate it!!!  Can't stand the wait though...Snooze is one of those places you needed to visit every once in awhile or for special occasions.  In the time it takes to get a seat
column3: I could look up the recipe for Snooze's Cinnamon Roll Pancakes
column4: and make the pancakes myself...as a matter of fact
column5: I just looked up a couple of them now
column6: lol!  Looking forward to trying them...
